name: Adrenaline Rush
text: Choose a non-Gold unit and keep it on the battlefield at the end of this round.
flavor: The Beast rushed at them, wildly, with fury in its eyes, immune to pain and any strikes the defenders could land. Nothing stood to stop it…

name: Aelirenn
text: Destroy all Commando Neophyte units on your side of the battlefield. Remove 1 strength from all non-Gold units on your opponent's side of the battlefield for each.
flavor: Better to die standing than to live on bent knee.

name: Aeromancy
text: Create and play one of the following: Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog or Torrential Rain.
flavor: The druid Vaedermakar controls the elements. He soothes storms into silence, musters destructive hail, summons lightning to turn foes into ash. So I advise you well… treat him with utmost respect.

name: Aglaïs
text: Choose a non-Gold Special Card from either graveyard and play it.
flavor: Brokilon bleeds… and not even I can heal it.

name: Alzur's Thunder
text: Remove 6 strength from 1 non-Gold unit.
flavor: We stand not the slightest chance of incanting a spell so complex as Alzur's Thunder. It is claimed Alzur had a voice like a hunting horn and the diction of a master orator.

name: Ancient Foglet
text: Fog effects do not harm this unit, but instead add 1 to its strength at the start of your turn while present.
flavor: Many primal fears lurk in the hearts of men. The fear of the mist is well–founded…

name: Arachas
text: Play all copies of this unit from your deck.
flavor: Ugly – Nature's Way of saying "stay away."

name: Arachas Behemoth
text: Spawn 1 Arachas unit whenever a friendly unit absorbs another unit's strength.
flavor: Like a cross between a crab, a spider… and a mountain.

name: Archgriffin
text: Remove any Weather effects from this unit's row (on your side of the battlefield only) and set the strength of any affected units to its original value.
flavor: It's a griffin, just more… griffiny.

name: Avallac'h
text: Draw 2 card(s). Your opponent draws 1 card(s).
flavor: You humans have… unusual tastes.

name: Ballista
text: Remove 2 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
flavor: What crossbows want to be when they grow up.

name: Barclay Els
text: Add 1 strength to all your non-Gold Dwarf units, wherever they are.
flavor: Our mead smells rotten to ye, do it? Easy to fix – I'll break yer nose!

name: Berserker
text: Transform into a Bear upon entering the graveyard.
flavor: Now finish your soup, or a berserker'll come and swallow ye whole.

name: Birna Bran
text: Draw 4 cards, keep 1 in your hand and discard the rest to your graveyard.
flavor: Skellige must have a strong king. No matter what it takes.

name: Biting Frost
text: Set the strength of all non-Gold units on both Melee rows to 1.
flavor: Best thing about frost? Bodies of The Fallen don't rot so quickly.

name: Bloody Baron
text: Spawn a Botchling or a Lubberkin.
flavor: I've not been a good father, I know, but… perhaps it's not too late.

name: Blue Mountain Commando
text: Choose a Bronze unit on your side of the battlefield. Return it to your hand and immediately play it again.
flavor: By the time we'd heard them, it was already too late…

name: Blue Stripes Commando
text: Add 2 strength to all your other copies of this unit, wherever they are.
flavor: I'd do anything for Temeria. Mostly though, I kill for her.

name: Blue Stripes Scout
text: Add 4 strength to 1 friendly non-Gold unit(s).
flavor: Blue Stripes and Scoia'tael are similar in one regard – hatred fuels both.

name: Blueboy Lugos
text: Create and play a Spectral Whale unit on a random row on your opponent's side of the battlefield.
flavor: I'm near ready to puke from boredom.

name: Borkh Three Jackdaws
text: After 3 turns, kill the strongest non-Gold unit(s) twice in a row.
flavor: Also calls himself Villentretenmerth… he's not the best at names.

name: Braenn
text: Discard a random Bronze card from your hand to your graveyard and draw a random Silver card.
flavor: Mona…? No… no. I'm Braenn. A daughter of Brokilon.

name: Brouver Hoog
text: Choose a Silver card from your deck and play it.
flavor: That doddery dolt? Ye cannae even tell if he's alive or stuffed!

name: Caranthir
text: Spawn Frost and spawn 2 Wild Hunt Hound unit(s).
flavor: A favorite son who chose a life of villainy.

name: Caretaker
text: Resurrect a non-Gold unit from your opponent's graveyard.
flavor: There are more things in heaven and earth than all the world's philosopher's have dreamt.

name: Cerys
text: When sent to the graveyard, convert to Silver status.
flavor: They call me Sparrowhawk. Know why? Because I eat rats like you for breakfast.

name: Ciaran
text: Play face down. Reveal at the end of the round. If the player on whose side this unit was played lost, move this unit to that player's hand.
flavor: The path to freedom is paved in blood, not ink.

name: Ciri
text: Return to your hand if you lose the round.
flavor: I go wherever I please, whenever I please.

name: Clan an Craite Raider
text: When this unit is discarded, play it instead.
flavor: We are an Craite! What others buy with gold, we buy with our lifeblood.

name: Clan an Craite Warrior
text: Remove 2 strength from this unit.
flavor: Our clan's bards will sing of my deeds long after you're dead and forgotten!

name: Clan Brokvar Archer
text: Choose 3 non-Gold units on the battlefield and remove 1 strength from each. Immune to Rain effects.
flavor: So ye can hit a movin' target at two hundred paces? Me, too. In a storm.

name: Clan Brokvar Hunter
text: Choose a non-Gold unit on the battlefield and remove 3 strength from it.
flavor: Better believe we can hunt. Thing is, not much game on Undvik…

name: Clan Dimun Pirate
text: Discard all copies of this unit from your deck to your graveyard. Immune to Fog effects.
flavor: Can see the fear in their eyes. Fear o' me… fear o' Clan Dimun!

name: Clan Dimun Pirate Captain
text: Add 3 strength to this unit whenever you discard a unit. Immune to Fog effects.
flavor: Haul together, hoist the colors high!

name: Clan Heymaey Skald
text: Add 2 strength to all other non-Gold units on the row.
flavor: The deeds of Clan Heymaey will go down in history.

name: Clan Tordarroch Shieldsmith
text: Choose a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield and add 4 strength to its original value.
flavor: Remember me words – a good shield can save yer life.

name: Clan Tuirseach Azeman
text: Add 2 strength to this unit each time another unit on your side of the battlefield has its strength reduced but is not destroyed.
flavor: Swords are for wenches. Get yourself an axe.

name: Clan Tuirseach Skirmishers
text: When played from the graveyard, add 4 to this unit's original strength.
flavor: Friends we show heart, foes we show our axe. Remember that.

name: Clear Skies
text: Remove all Weather and return all affected units to their base strength.
flavor: The sun's shinin', Dromle! The sun's shinin'! Maybe there's hope after all…

name: Commander's Horn
text: Choose a row on your side of the battlefield and double the strength of all non-Gold units on it.
flavor: Plus one to morale, minus one to hearing.

name: Crach an Craite
text: Create and play 2 Clan an Craite Warrior units.
flavor: Nilfgaardians call 'im Tirth ys Muire, the Wild Boar o' the Sea. Use 'im to scare their kiddies!

name: Crone: Brewess
text: Play all Crone units from your deck.
flavor: We'll cut you up, boy. A fine broth you will make.

name: Crone: Weavess
text: Play all Crone units from your deck.
flavor: I sense your pain. I see your fear.

name: Crone: Whispess
text: Play all Crone units from your deck.
flavor: I'd be your best – and last.

name: Dagon
text: Spawn Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog or Torrential Rain.
flavor: That is not dead which can eternal lie, and with strange aeons even death may die.

name: Dandelion
text: Spawn a Commander's Horn card.
flavor: Dandelion, you're a cynic, a lecher, a liar – and my best friend.

name: Decoy
text: Return a non-Gold unit on your side to your hand.
flavor: When you run out of peasants, decoys also make decent arrow fodder.

name: Dijkstra
text: Convert all other Gold units to Silver. Add 1 strength to this unit for each unit converted.
flavor: Really believe you can dupe me with that tale you just pulled from your arse?

name: Dimeritium Bomb
text: Reset all non-Gold units to their base strength.
flavor: An important part of every Witch Hunter's kit. In one muted flash, it turns the most powerful sorcerer into pork jelly ripe for cutting.

name: Dol Blathanna Archer
text: Choose a non-Gold unit on your opponent's side of the battlefield and remove 5 strength from it.
flavor: Take another step, dh'oine. You'd look better with an arrow between your eyes.

name: Dol Blathanna Trapper
text: Play face down. Reveal when a non-Gold unit appears on the row and remove 5 strength from it and all other non-Gold units on the row (except this Dol Blathanna Trapper unit).
flavor: They track like hounds, run like deer and kill like heartless demons.

name: Donar an Hindar
text: Draw 1 card and discard 1 card from your deck to your graveyard.
flavor: I've gathered all the jarls together. Now make your case.

name: Draig Bon-Dhu
text: Add 2 strength to all non-Gold units in your graveyard.
flavor: Hear ye now the tale of the heroic deeds of Clan an Craite.

name: Draug
text: Destroy all units with 3 strength or lower.
flavor: Some men cannot admit defeat. Some keep fighting From Beyond the grave.

name: Drowner
text: NULL
flavor: Though the witchman lusts for gold, for the smiting of a drowner thou shalt give him but a silver penny, or three halfpence, at most.

name: Dun Banner Heavy Cavalry
text: After 2 turns, convert to Gold.
flavor: Always wondered – how the blazes do those lads handle nature's call…?

name: Dun Banner Light Cavalry
text: NULL
flavor: Stay calm, everyone. And be alert. The true owners of those cloaks and beaver–skin caps might be elsewhere.

name: Dwarven Mercenary
text: Add 2 strength to this unit for each Dwarf unit already on your side of the battlefield.
flavor: The key's mixin' pleasure an' business – like smackin' foes and gettin' coin for it.

name: Dwarven Skirmisher
text: Choose a non-Gold unit on your opponent's side of the battlefield and remove 3 strength from it. If it is not destroyed, add 2 strength to this Dwarven Skirmisher unit.
flavor: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.

name: Earth Elemental
text: When removed from the battlefield, create and play 2 Lesser Earth Elemental units.
flavor: How do you fight an Earth Elemental? You don't. You run. Fast as you can.

name: Eithné
text: Choose any unit on your side of the battlefield. Return it to your hand and immediately play it again.
flavor: The dryad queen has eyes of molten silver, and a heart of cold–forged steel.

name: Shani
text: Resurrect a non-Gold unit and convert it to Gold.
flavor: I'm a medic. I tend to know what I'm doing when I prescribe something.

name: Sheldon Skaggs
text: NULL
flavor: I was there, on the front lines! Right where the fightin' was the thickest!

name: Sigrdrifa
text: Choose a non-Gold unit in your graveyard and play it. Whenever a unit is played from either graveyard, add 1 strength to this unit.
flavor: Fall on your knees and beg Modron Freya for forgiveness.

name: Sílle de Tansarville
text: Remove 4 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
flavor: The Lodge lacks humility. Our lust for power may yet be our undoing.

name: Skellige Storm
text: Spawn Fog and Rain.
flavor: This ain't no normal storm. This here's the wrath of the gods.

name: Skjall
text: Remove 3 strength from this unit and the strongest non-Gold unit(s) on your opponent's side of the battlefield. When removed from the battlefield, create and play Craven Revived.
flavor: Strike his name from the Saga of Elders! No one dare grant him shelter or sustenance!

name: Stammelford's Tremors
text: Remove 2 strength from all opposing non-Gold units.
flavor: The sorcerer Stammelford moved a mountain that obscured the view from his tower. Rumor has it he could only do so for he'd fettered a d'ao, an earth elemental.

name: Svanrige
text: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card from your hand.
flavor: The emperor also thought him an accidental king. At first.

name: Swallow Potion
text: Add 8 strength to a non-Gold unit or {add2} strength to a Witcher unit.
flavor: Symbolizing spring and rejuvenation, the swallow lent its name to this potion that accelerates the rate at which wounds scab over and heal.

name: Thaler
text: Replace a card in your hand with 1 card(s) randomly drawn from your deck.
flavor: Piss off! We aren't all philanderers. Some of us have depth…

name: The Last Wish
text: Draw 2 cards, discard 2 cards.
flavor: A djinn, good sirs, fulfills but three wishes. Thus freed, it flees to dimensions unknown.

name: Thunderbolt Potion
text: Choose a non-Gold unit on the battlefield and add 4 strength to all copies of it on the same side. If the unit is a Witcher, add 12 strength instead.
flavor: The wticher's face changed… his mien turning inhuman, horrifying.

name: Torrential Rain
text: Set the strength of all non-Gold units on both Melee rows to 1.
flavor: Even the rain in this land smells vile.

name: Toruviel
text: Play face down. Reveal when your opponent passes and add 2 strength to all non-Gold units on the row.
flavor: I'd gladly kill you from up close, stare in your eyes… But you reek, human.

name: Trebuchet
text: Remove 2 strength from 2 opposing non-Gold units.
flavor: Castle won't batter itself down, now will it? Get them trebuchets rollin'!

name: Triss Merigold
text: Remove 4 strength from 1 enemy unit.
flavor: I can take care of myself. Trust me.

name: Udalryk
text: Draw 1 random card from your opponent's graveyard to your hand.
flavor: The gods have spoken: a sacrifice is required.

name: Vernon Roche
text: Remove 5 strength from any opposing unit.
flavor: A patriot… and a real pain in the rear.

name: Ves
text: Play a Blue Stripes Commando from your deck whenever a new Gold card appears on your side.
flavor: Better to live one day as a king than a whole life as a beggar.

name: Vesemir
text: Play Eskel and Lambert from your deck.
flavor: If you're to be hanged, ask for water. Anything can happen before they fetch it.

name: Vran Warrior
text: NULL
flavor: They sat still on their horses, seemingly relaxed. He saw their weapons – short spears with wide tips. Swords with oddly forged guards. Battle axes. Toothed gisarmes.

name: Vrihedd Brigade
text: NULL
flavor: \Vrihedd? What's that mean?\" \"Trouble.\""

name: Vrihedd Dragoon
text: Whenever the strength of this unit changes but it is not destroyed, create and play 1 Commando Neophyte unit.
flavor: Most terrible things I've witnessed? The Catriona plague, the razing of Vengerberg and the charge of the Vrihedd Dragoons.

name: Vrihedd Officer
text: Add 1 strength to the weakest non-Gold unit(s) on your side of the battlefield. Remove 1 strength from the weakest non-Gold unit(s) on your opponent's side of the battlefield.
flavor: Hatred burns brighter than any fire, and cuts deeper than any blade.

name: Vrihedd Sappers
text: Whenever a Special Card is played, remove 2 strength from all non-Gold units on the row, including this unit.
flavor: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.

name: Vrihedd Vanguard
text: Create and play 1 Commando Neophyte unit.
flavor: Temerians, Redanians, all the same. Better off dead.

name: War Longship
text: Whenever a unit on your side of the battlefield is destroyed or you discard a unit card, remove 2 strength from a random non-Gold unit on your opponent's side of the battlefield.
flavor: They say Hemdall's heart swells whenever the longships sail out on a raid.

name: Warcry
text: Double the strength of all your weakened non-Gold units.
flavor: Some fight for Temeria. Other fight for Nilfgaard. I fight for the Heron.

name: Water Hag
text: Create Rain. Immune to Rain.
flavor: Seen a lot o' ugly critters in me life – morays, lampreys, blobfish… But never nothin' like this!

name: White Frost
text: Spawn Frost and Fog.
flavor: Behold Tedd Deireadh, the Final Age. The world destroyed by the White Frost.

name: Wild Hunt Rider
text: Play all copies of this unit from your deck. Immune to Frost effects.
flavor: First the buffalo horns atop their helms penetrate one's view, then the crest betwixt them, and finally the skull–like face exposed beneath their visors.

name: Wild Hunt Warrior
text: Choose a non-Gold unit on your opponent's side of the battlefield and remove 1 strength from it. If that unit was destroyed, add 2 strength to this unit. Immune to Frost effects.
flavor: The White Frost is coming.

name: Woodland Spirit
text: Spawn Fog and spawn 3 Rabid Wolf unit(s).
flavor: We never hunt in these woods. Not even if it means the whole village'll starve.

name: Wyvern
text: Choose a non-Gold unit on your opponent's side of the battlefield and remove 4 strength from it.
flavor: Imagine a cross between a winged snake and a nightmare. Wyverns are worse.

name: Yaevinn
text: Remove 2 strength from all other non-Gold units on the row. Draw a card.
flavor: We are the drops of rain that together make a ferocious storm.

name: Yarpen Zigrin
text: Keep this unit on the battlefield at the end of this round.
flavor: Ever hear o' the dragon Ocvist? From Quartz Mountain? Well, Yarpen Zigrin and his band o' dwarves did 'im in.

name: Yennefer
text: Spawn either a Unicorn or a Chironex.
flavor: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.

name: Young Berserker
text: Transform into a Young Bear if this unit's strength is reduced below its original value but it is not destroyed.
flavor: In their ballads skalds claim you cannot tell a berserker changed in the heat of battle from a true–born bear.

name: Zoltan Chivay
text: Keep this unit on the battlefield at the end of each round.
flavor: Drinkin' alone's like crappin' with company.

name: Zoltan: Animal Tamer
text: Spawn one of the two Field Marshal Duda.
flavor: Apologies. My exotic pet's a clever birdie, but a wee bit lewd. Paid ten thalers for the beaute.
